    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_edcbd0c4059057ed2e6845e09fa97067b3aac6f5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_edcbd0c4059057ed2e6845e09fa97067b3aac6f5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Polycrystalline solid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Polykristalliner Körper</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Solide polycristallin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sólido polycrystalline</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Solido policristallino</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πολυκρυσταλλικό στερεό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sólido polycrystalline</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a two-dimensional representation of a polycrystalline solid. A polycrystalline solid is made up of grains separated by grain boundaries indicated by the dashed lines.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polycrystalline solid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">grain boundaries</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine zweidimensionale 
Darstellung eines polykristallinen Körpers. Ein 
polykristalliner Körper besteht die Körner, die durch die 
Kristallgrenzen getrennt werden, die durch die gestrichelten Zeilen 
angezeigt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une représentation 
bidimensionnelle d'un solide polycristallin. Un solide 
polycristallin se compose des grains séparés par des bornes de grain
indiquées par les lignes tirées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma respresentação 
bidimensional de um sólido polycrystalline. Um sólido 
polycrystalline é composto das grões separadas pelos limites de 
grão indicados pelas linhas tracejadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una rappresentazione 
bidimensionale di un solido policristallino. Un solido 
policristallino si compone dei grani separati dai contorni di grano 
indicati dalle linee tratteggiate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δισδιάστατη 
αντιπροσώπευση ενός πολυκρυσταλλικού στερεού. Ένα 
πολυκρυσταλλικό στερεό αποτελείται από τα σιτάρια που χωρίζονται
από τα όρια σιταριού που υποδεικνύονται από τις ορμούμενες 
γραμμές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una representación de 
dos dimensiones de un sólido polycrystalline. Un sólido 
polycrystalline se compone de los granos separados por los límites de
grano indicados por las líneas discontinuas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">polykristalliner Körper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kristallgrenzen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">solide polycristallin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bornes de grain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sólido polycrystalline</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">limites de grão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">solido policristallino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">contorni di grano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πολυκρυσταλλικό στερεό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">όρια σιταριού</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sólido polycrystalline</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">límites de grano</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
